full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'CHI LTAS BRTAG PA DANG 'CHI BA BSLU BA'I THABS TSE KHRID DANG BCAS PA 'CHI MED DGA' STON
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (CES 'CHI LTAS BRTAG PA DANG 'CHI BA BSLU BA'I THABS @015A *, ,TSE KHRID DANG BCAS PA 'CHI MED DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, PAndI TA NGAG GI DBANG PHYUG GRAGS PA'I GZHUNG DANG` RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I 'PHO KHRID GSER GYI SGO 'BYED DANG, RJE DGE 'DUN 'GRUB KYI GSUNG RNAMS LA BRTEN NAS ^RIG PA 'DZIN PA LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SGRA RIG SMRA BA BSAM GTAN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE,
